subHeader: Leading front-end development for Dekaflow 2, a next-gen energy management platform.
highlights: Architect reusable React + TypeScript components with Material UI & Next.js for scalable performance.
Drive accessibility and WCAG compliance across the platform.
Mentor junior engineers in front-end patterns, Jotai state management, and performance best practices.
Collaborate across Agile squads (design, QA, backend) to deliver high-impact features.

subHeader: Co-founded and led development of a social dance app connecting dancers worldwide.
highlights: Designed and shipped on iOS & Android with real-time chat, event scheduling, and location-aware features.
Built a React web companion app and Supabase backend.
Navigated App Store / Google Play policies, ensuring smooth deployments.
Championed inclusive design, ensuring accessibility was never an afterthought.

subHeader: Built and maintained multiple brand websites, partnering closely with the marketing team to deliver scalable, accessible platforms.
highlights: Built Hot Tomato Summer, a live voting platform reaching 30K+ users in 2 weeks.
Created marketing dashboards and admin tools empowering non-technical teams to manage content in real time.
Deployed the Kernel Season’s Giveaway platform with user dashboards and QR code integration.
Cut costs by $250K annually by replacing third-party tools with in-house AI solutions.
Led ADA compliance audits and implemented screen reader–friendly markup and keyboard navigation.

subHeader: Short-term contract focused on modernizing the site’s accessibility and user experience. Part-Time.
highlights: Audited and remediated ADA accessibility issues across the organization’s main website.
Migrated the site to Wix, giving the marketing team a manageable platform after contract end.
Improved UI/UX, simplifying navigation and content structure for broader accessibility.
Trained the marketing team to manage the site independently after transition.

subHeader: Developed IoT mobile solutions that translated complex HVAC diagnostics into simple, user-friendly experiences.
highlights: Developed a cross-platform React Native app displaying real-time IoT data.
Built a visual check engine light system for HVAC systems, enabling proactive maintenance.
Partnered with backend & design teams to deliver responsive, intuitive UI.
Prioritized performance and accessibility across both Android and iOS.

subHeader: Part-time frontend development role focused on improving web presence and streamlining marketing workflows.
highlights: Planned and implemented updated web technologies to improve operational efficiency.
Mitigated risks and ensured continuity by identifying and addressing potential workflow issues.
Improved mobile and tablet UX using Bootstrap’s responsive grid system.
Streamlined marketing by consolidating 10+ disparate email templates into a unified master template.

subHeader: Built web experiences ranging from social media platforms to VR interfaces, flexing between React, Liquid, PHP, and more.
highlights: Delivered rapid-turnaround front-end solutions from social media platforms to VR interfaces for military applications.
Adapted quickly to new codebases, shifting technologies weekly (React, Liquid, PHP, HTML/CSS).
Partnered with clients to deliver responsive, user-focused web experiences under tight deadlines.

subHeader: Designed and developed responsive websites and applications for a diverse client base, from authors to real estate professionals and non-profits.
highlights: Delivered custom websites and applications leveraging HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React.js, and WordPress.
Created user-friendly, responsive designs tailored to each client’s brand and business goals.
Built interactive web apps such as property listing tools for real estate clients to improve engagement.
Partnered with non-profits to create impactful sites that communicated their mission and maximized donor engagement.
Maintained long-term client relationships, providing updates and feature enhancements as needs evolved.
Ensured cross-platform compatibility and performance optimization across all projects.
